body_html:
I believe this is similar to the cond() and you can find the explanation here: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/api_docs/python/control_flow_ops.html#cond

Basically the increase op will always run in both cases.

body:
I believe this is similar to the cond() and you can find the explanation here: https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/api_docs/python/control_flow_ops.html#cond

Basically the increase op will always run in both cases.
